epics.title: User Authentication and Security
epics.summary: Implement secure user authentication and security features
epics.description: Develop a multi-factor authentication system to ensure secure logins. Implement encryption protocols to protect sensitive financial data. Enable features for password recovery and account lockout after multiple failed attempts.

epics.title: Personalized Dashboard
epics.description: Design and build a personalized dashboard that displays available banking products and services based on user profile and eligibility. Ensure the dashboard provides an intuitive and user-friendly interface for easy navigation.

epics.title: Account Requests and Modifications
epics.summary: Implement functionality for account opening requests and modifications
epics.description: Develop workflows to allow customers to submit account opening requests and service modifications with minimal clicks. Ensure the process is streamlined and user-friendly.

epics.title: Real-Time Status Updates
epics.description: Implement a system to provide real-time status updates and email notifications regarding submitted requests. Ensure the updates are timely and accurate.

epics.title: Interaction History
epics.summary: Maintain a comprehensive history of user interactions
epics.description: Develop a feature to maintain a comprehensive history of all user interactions. Ensure the data is secure and easily accessible for the user.

epics.title: Responsive Design
epics.summary: Ensure the portal is responsive across various devices
epics.description: Develop a responsive design for the portal to provide a consistent experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. Ensure compatibility with different screen sizes and resolutions.

epics.title: Save Incomplete Applications
epics.summary: Allow users to save and return to incomplete applications
epics.description: Implement functionality to allow users to save incomplete applications and return to them at a later time. Enable users to upload necessary documentation directly through the interface.

epics.title: Core Banking Integration
epics.summary: Integrate the portal with the bank's core banking system
epics.description: Ensure seamless integration with the bank's existing core banking system. Maintain a separate database for the portal to ensure optimal performance and reliability.

epics.title: Role-Based Access Control
epics.description: Develop and implement role-based access controls to ensure users can only view and access services appropriate to their profile and authorization level.

user_stories.title: Develop multi-factor authentication system
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to use multi-factor authentication, so that I can ensure secure logins.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The system should support various forms of multi-factor authentication such as SMS, email, and authenticator apps.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users must be able to enable multi-factor authentication from their profile settings.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with valid credentials, When the user opts to enable multi-factor authentication, Then the user should be able to complete the setup process successfully.

user_stories.title: Implement encryption protocols
user_stories.description: As a user, I want my financial data to be encrypted, so that my sensitive information is protected.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Use industry-standard encryption protocols such as AES-256.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: All sensitive financial data should be stored and transmitted in encrypted form.
user_stories.test_cases: Given sensitive financial data, When the data is stored or transmitted, Then it should be encrypted using AES-256.

user_stories.title: Enable password recovery and account lockout
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to recover my password and have my account locked after multiple failed attempts, so that my account remains secure.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Provide secure password recovery options and lock the account after 5 failed login attempts.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users should be able to recover their passwords securely. Accounts should be locked after multiple failed login attempts.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with a valid account, When the user fails to log in consecutively 5 times, Then the account should be locked. Given a locked account, When the user attempts to recover the password, Then the user should be able to complete the recovery process successfully.

user_stories.title: Design personalized dashboard interface
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can view relevant banking products and services.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The dashboard should display products and services relevant to the user's profile.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The dashboard should show personalized content based on the user's profile.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with a specific profile, When the user logs in, Then the dashboard should display relevant products and services.

user_stories.title: Provide intuitive navigation
user_stories.description: As a user, I want an intuitive and user-friendly interface, so that I can navigate the dashboard easily.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure the interface is straightforward and easy to use.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users should be able to navigate the dashboard without confusion.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user on the dashboard, When navigating through the features, Then the user should be able to access all features seamlessly.

user_stories.title: Display user eligibility for products
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to see my eligibility for banking products, so that I can take advantage of available services.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Eligibility should be clearly displayed for each product.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Eligible products and services should be highlighted on the dashboard.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with specific eligibility criteria, When the user views the dashboard, Then eligible products should be highlighted.

user_stories.title: Streamline account opening requests
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to submit account opening requests with minimal clicks, so that the process is efficient.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Minimize the number of steps required to complete the request.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Account opening requests should be streamlined and require minimal clicks.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user wanting to open an account, When submitting the request, Then the user should be able to complete it with minimal steps.

user_stories.title: Implement service modifications
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to modify my account services with minimal clicks, so that the process is simple.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure service modifications are easy to complete.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users should be able to modify account services easily.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with existing account services, When modifying the services, Then the user should be able to complete the changes with minimal steps.

user_stories.title: Enhance user-friendly process
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a user-friendly process for account requests and modifications, so that I can complete actions without frustration.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The process should be intuitive and straightforward.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The process for account requests and modifications should be user-friendly and intuitive.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user needing to request or modify an account, When going through the process, Then the user should find it simple and straightforward.

user_stories.title: Provide real-time status updates
user_stories.description: As a user, I want real-time status updates on my requests, so that I am always informed.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Status updates should be immediate and accurate.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users should receive real-time updates on their requests.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with an ongoing request, When there is a status update, Then the user should receive it in real-time.

user_stories.title: Send email notifications for status changes
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to receive email notifications for status updates, so that I can stay informed about my requests.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Emails should be triggered for every change in request status.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users should receive email notifications for every status change.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with a request, When the status changes, Then the user should receive an email notification.

user_stories.title: Ensure timely and accurate updates
user_stories.description: As a user, I want updates to be timely and accurate, so that I trust the system.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The system must ensure no delays in status updates.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Updates should be prompt and reflect the accurate status.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with ongoing requests, When the request status changes, Then the system should provide timely and accurate updates.
